record.dc:title: 2MCL6, 15MCL6, McLean County, Kentucky. Eaton Site. Soil profile indicates plowline.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Normal soil profile indicated the plowline, and the subplowline topsoil. At the right hand side is the remnant of an old stump-mold. From Notes: Weather -- clear and bright sun. Adjustments -- f 32 & 1/2 sec. Subject -- 85' profile taken at an oblique angle from 95' line and on top dirt pile. Scope -- R-9 to L5 on 85' profile.
